snippet: Gay rights groups announced that they had chosen two lawyers, Mary L. Bonauto and Douglas Hallward-Dreimeier, to present Supreme Court arguments on April 28 in favor of a constitutional right to same-sex marriage.
abstract: Gay rights groups say they have chosen lawyers Mary L Bonauto and Douglas Hallward-Driemeier to present arguments to Supreme Court in favor of constitutional right to same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: Gay rights groups announced that they had chosen two lawyers, Mary L. Bonauto and Douglas Hallward-Dreimeier, to present Supreme Court arguments on April 28 in favor of a constitutional right to same-sex marriage.
